channel.title: Algebras on EduGovNet.com
channel.description: Recent content in Algebras on EduGovNet.com

item.title: Modules, Vector Spaces, and More!
item.description: In the previous entry, we introduced Rings and Fields. In this entry we continue our investigation. We will investigate structures that can be built on top of them. This entry will mostly involve grinding through fundamental proofs that are necessary for more interesting results which will come later.
